page.title: 16HOUSING
page.content: Most houses were until the last decade in the southern area of our allocated area, and many dated from World War II. However, the last decade or so has seen an enormous new housing development in the middle of our allocated area by the likes of firms such as Wimpey Homes. These houses are so new that they do not as yet appear on Ordanance Survey maps of our area, yet we are talking of hundreds rather than just a handful of new homes. Slowly but surely, these are filling the last green belt between Crewe Central and Leighton Hospital. It is only a metter of time before they completely surround it.
